articles.title: Get the new Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Ultra for as cheap as $400 - Digital Trends
articles.description: The 256GB model of the Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Ultra, originally priced at $1,200, could be yours for as low as $400 through Samsung's tablet trade-in program.

articles.title: Audi's RS6 Avant GT Costs $70,000 More Than the Regular RS6 Avant - Road & Track
articles.description: The 2025 Audi RS6 Avant GT super-wagon starts at $198,900. Assuming Audi's usual destination fee of $1295 is added on top, it actually starts at $200,195.
articles.content: Back in February, Audi revealed an RS6 Avant variant that took inspiration from its championship-winning IMSA GTO days. That car, dubbed the RS6 Avant GT, was faster, quicker, and more limited in pro… [+2163 chars]
